text: The Donji Vir (; , Donji Vir) is one of the smallest mountain lakes in the Šar Mountains of Kosovo. It is shaped like a circle and has a rough diameter of . It is situated just a few metres west of the larger Small Jazhincë Lake. == See also == * Small Jažinačko Lake == Notes and references == Notes: References: \---- Category:Šar Mountains Category:Lakes of Kosovo Category:Lakes of Serbia
title: Donji Vir Lake
